metadata.description: Superman’s entire world has changed! Following the events of the “Brainiac” storyline, a thousand new Krpytonians are in modern day. What do they want and how will their appearance affect not only the Man of Steel but the people of Earth as well? Tensions rise, sides are chosen, and loyalties and friendships are tested as a “New Krypton” rises.
metadata.name: Superman: New Krypton
